mapper.sql: id, state_type_id, weapon_type_id_1, weapon_type_id_2, weapon_model_id, weapon_model_name, skill_points, cd_n, cd_x, link_num, is_dual_use, action_radius, ammunition_speed, `precision` AS precision, ignition_rate, leakage_rate, damage, `HE_damage` AS he_damage, `AP_damage` AS ap_damage, `SAP_damage` AS sap_damage, damage_range, penetration_level_start, penetration_level_end, core_breakdown, half_breakdown, pass_breakdown, size, payload, `HP` AS hp, move_speed, hangar, `recovery_speed_N` AS recovery_speed_n, `recovery_speed_X` AS recovery_speed_x, arrival_time, distance_before_attack, description, weapon_type_id_3, weapon_type_id_4, weapon_type_id_5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO weapon_archive ( state_type_id, weapon_type_id_1, weapon_type_id_2, weapon_model_id, weapon_model_name, skill_points, cd_n, cd_x, link_num, is_dual_use, action_radius, ammunition_speed, `precision`, ignition_rate, leakage_rate, damage, `HE_damage`, `AP_damage`, `SAP_damage`, damage_range, penetration_level_start, penetration_level_end, core_breakdown, half_breakdown, pass_breakdown, size, payload, `HP`, move_speed, hangar, recovery_speed_n, recovery_speed_x, arrival_time, distance_before_attack, description, weapon_type_id_3, weapon_type_id_4, weapon_type_id_5 ) VALUES ( #{stateTypeId}, #{weaponTypeId1}, #{weaponTypeId2}, #{weaponModelId}, #{weaponModelName}, #{skillPoints}, #{cdN}, #{cdX}, #{linkNum}, #{isDualUse}, #{actionRadius}, #{ammunitionSpeed}, #{precision}, #{ignitionRate}, #{leakageRate}, #{damage}, #{heDamage}, #{apDamage}, #{sapDamage}, #{damageRange}, #{penetrationLevelStart}, #{penetrationLevelEnd}, #{coreBreakdown}, #{halfBreakdown}, #{passBreakdown}, #{size}, #{payload}, #{hp}, #{moveSpeed}, #{hangar}, #{recoverySpeedN}, #{recoverySpeedX}, #{arrivalTime}, #{distanceBeforeAttack}, #{description}, #{weaponTypeId3}, #{weaponTypeId4}, #{weaponTypeId5} )
mapper.select: SELECT FROM weapon_archive WHERE state_type_id = #{stateTypeId} ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT FROM weapon_archive ORDER BY id ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE weapon_archive SET state_type_id = #{stateTypeId}, weapon_type_id_1 = #{weaponTypeId1}, weapon_type_id_2 = #{weaponTypeId2}, weapon_model_id = #{weaponModelId}, weapon_model_name = #{weaponModelName}, skill_points = #{skillPoints}, cd_n = #{cdN}, cd_x = #{cdX}, link_num = #{linkNum}, is_dual_use = #{isDualUse}, action_radius = #{actionRadius}, ammunition_speed = #{ammunitionSpeed}, `precision` = #{precision}, ignition_rate = #{ignitionRate}, leakage_rate = #{leakageRate}, damage = #{damage}, `HE_damage` = #{heDamage}, `AP_damage` = #{apDamage}, `SAP_damage` = #{sapDamage}, damage_range = #{damageRange}, penetration_level_start = #{penetrationLevelStart}, penetration_level_end = #{penetrationLevelEnd}, core_breakdown = #{coreBreakdown}, half_breakdown = #{halfBreakdown}, pass_breakdown = #{passBreakdown}, size = #{size}, payload = #{payload}, `HP` = #{hp}, move_speed = #{moveSpeed}, hangar = #{hangar}, `recovery_speed_N` = #{recoverySpeedN}, `recovery_speed_X` = #{recoverySpeedX}, arrival_time = #{arrivalTime}, distance_before_attack = #{distanceBeforeAttack}, description = #{description}, weapon_type_id_3 = #{weaponTypeId3}, weapon_type_id_4 = #{weaponTypeId4}, weapon_type_id_5 = #{weaponTypeId5} WHERE id = #{id}
